swade-fear-points.player-visibility-hint: Controls whether the players can display the fear points counter or not.
swade-fear-points.open-at-startup-hint: If enabled, the fear points window will open at startup.
swade-fear-points.characters-only-hint: If enabled, only characters will be affected by fear points.
swade-fear-points.per-scene-hint: If enabled, default behavior will be modified, and fear points will be awarded per scene.
